page.title: 08SAND: ARCHEOLOGY
page.content:
{Double Arches Quarries,}one of the most important in the area, has been the scene of many interesting finds.
One of these involved the remains of two{Romano-British}people.The male had his head chopped off but he actually died from a piercing blow to the head behind the ear. The female body had no such featues.{Saxon}pottery was found around the bodies.
A{Roman}well was found at Double Arches but the evidence was destroyed before expert examination. Nine inches below ground there was circular brickwork, the bottom was 12 feet lower. Unexplained, was a 'V' shaped grove in the top of the brickwork.
